description: Wanted to like this app, as I'm warming to the idea of using tags rather than directories in userland. This app isn't baked IMHO. Couldn't resize the fonts (I'm older so they're too small by default) and on second launch the app froze - Had to kill it forcefully. Consequently removed. I may try it in a later interation.
This is a bare-bones featured software that i'm using with PureOS. I swapped it out with Synology's Note Station that comes with their NAS system. Much better. This one is hard to use.
